metadata.title: CVE-2023-23549 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Improper Input Validation in Checkmk <2.2.0p15, <2.1.0p37, <=2.0.0p39allows priviledged attackers to cause partial denial of service of the UIvia too long hostnames.

criterions.comment: check-mk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
